glsa.title: QGit: Insecure temporary file creation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability has been discovered in QGit allowing local users to overwrite arbitrary files and execute arbitrary code with another user's rights.

background.p: QGit is a graphical interface to git repositories that allows you to browse revisions history, view patch content and changed files.

description.p: Raphael Marichez discovered that the DataLoader::doStart() method creates temporary files in an insecure manner and executes them.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform a symlink attack, possibly overwriting files or executing arbitrary code with the rights of the user running QGit.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
